Fire Release Great Flame Rasengan.png;Card game version. |kanji=火遁・豪炎螺旋丸 |unnamed jutsu=No |romaji=Katon: Gōen Rasengan |literal english=Fire Release: Great Flame Spiralling Sphere |game names=Hell Fire: Rasengan |other names=Grand Flames Rasengan
Flame Rasengan |parent jutsu=Rasengan |jutsu classification=Ninjutsu |jutsu type=Fire Release |jutsu class type=Offensive |jutsu range=Short |users=Jiraiya |debut shippuden=No |game debut=Naruto: Ultimate Ninja 3 |jutsu media=Game }} Jiraiya creates a normal Rasengan, then spews [[fire]] onto it, causing it to turn black and be surrounded by a ring of flames. He then hits the opponent, causing a blazing maelstrom of fire, reducing the opponent to ashes. == See Also == * [[Spiralling Great Fire Sphere]] * [[Wind Release: Rasengan]] == Reference == [[es:Elemento Fuego: Rasengan en Llamas]] [[pl:Katon: Gōen Rasengan]] [[pt-br:Liberação de Fogo: Grande Rasengan em Chamas]]
